SELECT ID AS id ,COMP_NAME AS compNm ,COMP_ADDR_DESC AS compAddr ,COMP_CNTN AS compCntn ,COMP_LEVEL_CODE AS compLevelCode ,CRE_TM AS creTm ,CRE_USER AS creUser ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER X WHERE C.ID=X.COMP_ID) AS registeredUserCount ,UPD_TM AS updTm ,UPD_USER AS updUser ,DEL_YN AS deleteYn FROM TB_COMP C WHERE 1 = 1
AND C.COMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{filter.compNm} ,'%')
AND C.COMP_ADDR_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{filter.compAddr} ,'%')
AND C.COMP_CNTN LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{filter.compCntn} ,'%')
AND C.COMP_LEVEL_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{filter.compLevelCode} ,'%')
AND DEL_YN = 'N'
